headline: Joe Biden vows to shield Americans from gas price spike. That won't be easy
author: Matt Egan
sentences: Earlier this month, Democratic Senators Mark Kelly and Maggie Hassan introduced legislation that would seek to eliminate 18 cents per gallon of federal gas taxes until January 1.
New York (CNN Business)President Joe Biden, facing the risk of a destabilizing energy price shock, is promising to blunt the impact of rising energy prices on American families.
